original_text: And he did that which was right in the sight of the Lord, and walked in all the way of David his father, and turned not aside to the right hand or to the left.
korean_text: 요시야가 여호와 보시기에 정직히 행하여 그의 조상 다윗의 모든 길로 행하고 좌우로 치우치지 아니하였더라

sentences.original_text: And he did that which was right
in the sight of the Lord
and walked in all the way
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아버지 다윗의 모든 길로 행하였고

sentences.original_text: to the right hand or to the left
